context.p: You can use a calculator app on your smartphone. You will find it useful when you need to quickly calculate some numbers.

step.cmd: Navigate to the calculator application icon.

taskbody.result: You are now ready to calculate with the app.
taskbody.postreq: For example, if you have purchased a book for 10$ and you have given 20$, how much change should you expect? Answer is 20-10=10 $ change.
